message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $90, you take $10. It's a good offer for you to get something rather than nothing in the later rounds.
Let's meet in the middle, a 60-40 split is more than fair.
Bob, my last offer was too generous. Let's be reasonable, 70/30 is my final offer.
I'm willing to compromise, 55-45 is a fair deal.
Bob, we're running out of time. I'm sticking to a larger share, but this is a better deal than you'll get in later rounds.  Take the $35.
I'm willing to shave off a bit more, let's meet closer to the middle.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you a very reasonable $40, take it before I change my mind!
I'll shave off one more dollar, this is as low as I'm willing to go.
Bob, we're down to the wire.  This is my final offer - take it or leave it! $45 is better than nothing.
